text: wanda mahaifiyarsa ta fito daga Dan, mahaifinsa kuma daga Taya. An horar da shi a aikin zinariya, azurfa, tagulla, baƙin ƙarfe, dutse, itace, da kuma shuɗi, shunayya, garura, da lilin mai kyau. Ya gogu a kowane irin zāne-zāne, zai kuma iya yin kowane zānen da aka ba shi. Zai yi aiki tare da masu sana’arka, da kuma tare da waɗanda ranka yă daɗe, Dawuda mahaifinka ya tanada.
